faq-001.question: What software development services do you offer?
faq-001.answer: We offer website development, web applications, mobile apps (Android & iOS), e-commerce solutions, and custom software development services. We use modern technologies including React, Next.js, Flutter, Node.js.

faq-002.question: How long does it take to build a website or app?
faq-002.answer: Project timeline varies by complexity. Simple website 1-2 weeks, e-commerce 2-3 weeks, and custom web/mobile app can take 4-8 weeks. We work in agile method so you'll see progress every week.

faq-003.question: How does your pricing work?
faq-003.answer: We have various packages - Basic website starts from ‡ß≥10,000, Business website ‡ß≥25,000, Mobile app starts from ‡ß≥30,000. For custom projects, get a free consultation.

faq-004.question: Will I get support after project completion?
faq-004.answer: Yes! Every project includes free support - Basic package 1 month, Business package 3 months, Premium package 6 months. After that, you can opt for monthly maintenance packages.

faq-005.question: What is the best way to contact you?
faq-005.answer: Phone: 01570260118, WhatsApp: 01570260118, Email: rahmatullahzisan@gmail.com. Fill out the contact form for free consultation or call directly.

faq-1.question: What technologies do you use?
faq-1.answer: Frontend: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS. Mobile: Flutter, React Native. Backend: Node.js, Python. Database: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Cloudflare D1. Hosting: Cloudflare, Vercel, AWS.

faq-2.question: What are the payment methods?
faq-2.answer: We support bKash, Nagad, Rocket, and bank transfer. 50% advance payment and remaining 50% after project delivery.

faq-3.question: Will I get the source code?
faq-3.answer: Yes! Complete source code is handed over after project completion. Code is transferred via GitHub/GitLab. Documentation is also provided.

faq-4.question: Will the mobile app work on both Android and iOS?
faq-4.answer: Yes! We build cross-platform apps using Flutter or React Native that work on both Android and iOS. Separate native apps can also be built.

faq-5.question: Do you provide hosting?
faq-5.answer: Yes! We provide BDIX Cloudflare hosting service which is super fast in Bangladesh. Free hosting is included in website packages. SSL certificate is also free.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.description: At Digital Care Solutions, we give the highest priority to your data privacy.

section1.title: 1. What Information Do We Collect?
section1.content: We collect personal information you provide (name, email, phone number, company name, etc.) when you fill out forms on our website, join our affiliate program, or contact us directly. Additionally, analytics tools may collect browser, device, and usage behavior data.

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Information Use
section2.content: Collected information is primarily used to provide services, customer support, notify about offers or updates, and improve our service quality. We never sell or illegally use your information to third parties.

section3.title: 3. Cookies & Tracking Technologies
section3.content: We use cookies in a limited scope to improve user experience and analyze website functionality. You can disable cookies from browser settings, but some website features may not work properly.

section4.title: 4. Information Security
section4.content: We use modern security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, modification, or disclosure. However, 100% security cannot be guaranteed for internet data transmission.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.content: We may use third-party services like payment gateways, analytics, or automation tools. These service providers have their own privacy policies. We cannot control their activities but try to ensure data protection under contract.

section6.title: 6. User Rights
section6.content: You can request to view, correct, or delete your personal information that we have. If you don't want to receive marketing messages, you can unsubscribe at any time.

section7.title: 7. Policy Changes
section7.content: This privacy policy may change from time to time due to technology or legal reasons. We will notify significant changes through website notice or email.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy, contact: rahmatullahzisan@gmail.com or 01570260118.
